title: 18: Confirmation Bias in Your (Fake?) News
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: Join us in a wide ranging discussion about confirmation bias in the news sources that we choose to follow in our everyday lives.  We cover how in light of the societal shift in the US it has become important to branch out and digest sources that countervail our own opinions and to take a page out of the books of journalists and question the source and how it might spin the presentation of information.
